name: The Spirit Walker
description:
My submission for the 2022 GDTV game jam!

Other Notes:

If you are using a keyboard, I updated the menu to work better. The revive also works when you are pressing and holding interact in a certain range of your body.

Controls (Best with a controller):

Light Attack: Right trigger/ L mouse button

Heavy Attack: Left trigger/ R mouse button

Dodge: A/ X/ Space

Interact/ Revive: X/ Square/ E

Pause: Select/ Tab
